Html:
On the Developer's Guide to Microsoft Prism (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg406140.aspx) under the "Future" section it says:

"The next release of Prism is planned for the summer or fall of 2012"

Now that it is the fall of 2013, when can we look forward to the next release/updates?
I guess I'll just have to assume there is no future.

Hi lloydchristmas,

You can find a heads up from Blaine regarding Prism next update in the following thread:
